item.title: Many towns are unprepared to handle train derailments and hazmat spills
item.description: Train derailments involving spills of 1,000 gallons or more of hazardous materials happen a few times a year, often resulting in evacuations or fires

item.title: Pakistan, China and Afghanistan hold summit in Kabul to boost cooperation
item.description: Top diplomats from Pakistan, China, and Afghanistan are meeting in Kabul for a trilateral summit

item.title: Target's COO will lead the struggling retailer when CEO Brian Cornell steps down
item.description: Target CEO Brian Cornell plans to step down Feb. 1
